== Web Site ==

=== Admins ===

These members have complete control over the LoCo site. They manage who is a user, what roles they have, what content exists, etc. They also oversee all content and event management.

=== Editors ===

These members are allowed to edit all content on the site including events.

=== Users ===

These members have a slightly higher status that any random join. They have a few more privileges that non-users.
